info.name: DUST Menus for Firefox
info.description:
A re-imagining of style 62205, which is all the work of user 26440.
Some Snow Leopard still remains, poking through.

Part of my DUST suite:


style 62204
style 62208
style 65013
style 86441
info.additionalInfo:
Tested on Firefox Stable, Beta & Pale Moon.

2013.10.17 - Colour Options to match with style 62204
2013.10.14 - Fixed static png for Fx 25.
2013.7.8 - Colour changes to purple when in private browsing mode.
2013.7.6 - Added colour options.
2013.6.20 - Initial release
